mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Come experience the luxury of never having to wait or worry about pesky rules again.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-last week, I walk into my favorite coffee shop, and they're out of almond milk for my latte. Can you believe the audacity? I mean, who runs out of almond milk in this day and age? I immediately demanded to speak to the manager, because clearly, this was a personal attack on my refined taste buds.After giving the poor barista a piece of my mind, the manager finally emerges and apologizes, but I wasn't satisfied. I demanded a full refund for my drink, plus a gift card for future lattes as compensation for my inconvenience. Oh, and I made sure to throw in a few dramatic sighs for effect.But it doesn't end there! I then proceeded to write a scathing Yelp review detailing the traumatic experience I endured at the hands of this almond milk-deprived establishment. Because if there's one thing the world needs to know, it's that Hot Josh will not stand for subpar dairy alternatives.And you know what? Not only did I get my refund and gift card, but the manager also promised to never run out of almond milk again. That's right, folks-thanks to my unwavering entitlement, future latte drinkers will never face the horror of a milkless morning. Ah, the power of being Hot Josh.
